vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (patch_12.sol#8-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success) = recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_12.sol#12)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_bonus.getFirstWithdrawalBonus (patch_12.sol#16-23):
	External calls:
	- withdrawReward(address(recipient)) (patch_12.sol#21)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedBonus (patch_12.sol#22)

solc-version
